GNU Multi-precision library interface for D

There are two parts to this interface to the C library GMP. The first, in the file gmp.d, is the low-level interface directly to the C API.
The second, in the files mpz.d, mpq.d and mpf.d, are D classes providing a high-level interface that can be tuned for high performance when needed.
For more information about GMP or D see http://www.swox.com/gmp and http://www.digitalmars.com/d
